sys_script.name: Test

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_d0b716881b88e8549d4e6392f54bcbe8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_isgi_roster_plan</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Test</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var gdtNow = new GlideDateTime(current.start_date);
var gdtActual = new GlideDateTime(current.end_date);
var compare = gdtNow.compareTo(gdtActual);
var days, difference;



if (compare === -1) {
  
  difference = GlideDateTime.subtract(gdtNow, gdtActual);
  days = difference.getDayPart();

} else if (compare === 1) {
  
  difference = GlideDateTime.subtract(gdtActual , gdtNow );
  days = difference.getDayPart();
  
} else {
	days = 0;
}

gs.addInfoMessage('Now: ' + gdtNow.getDisplayValue());
gs.addInfoMessage('Actual: ' + gdtActual.getDisplayValue());
gs.addInfoMessage('Difference: ' + difference.getDisplayValue());
gs.addInfoMessage('Days: ' + days);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mohamed.rafiulla@isg-one.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-19 14:23:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d0b716881b88e8549d4e6392f54bcbe8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Test</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="roster" source="x_isgi_roster">3f44a5b11b739c149d4e6392f54bcbbf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="roster">3f44a5b11b739c149d4e6392f54bcbbf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d0b716881b88e8549d4e6392f54bcbe8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mohamed.rafiulla@isg-one.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-19 14:36:20</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d0b716881b88e8549d4e6392f54bcbe8"/></record_update>
